item.title: Self Hosting PeerTube
item.description: The “Fediverse” migration continues - after trying out Mastodon for “micro blogging”, I figured I’d try out PeerTube for my synthesizer jam videos, etc. My server and local videos will be hosted @ https://peertube.sqweeb.net. The PeerTube documentation has a pretty good starting point for hosting via Docker and docker compose - I started with that. The docker-compose.yml file example they give you comes with a separate web server and “cert bot” container for managing SSL/TLS certificates with LetsEncrypt.
